rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall connecting the living area and corridors with a reception area for guests. Vastu principles favor an inviting entry.
Contemporary open-plan living space with ample natural light. Windows on the south-east to bring positive energy as per Vastu.
Adjacent to the kitchen for a family dining experience, with openings ensuring ventilation and sunlight.
Modern kitchen equipped for joint family use. Includes prep area and storage, with windows on east side per Vastu guidelines for fire element balance.
Luxurious bedroom for the head of the household, incorporating an ensuite bathroom and closet. Windows placed in accordance with north direction to promote mental clarity.
Three additional bedrooms designed for other family members ensuring privacy and comfort. Bedrooms arranged on the west side per Vastu norms.
Guest bathroom with natural ventilation and sufficient space for joint family use.

openings.description: Entrance door that welcomes positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows allowing abundant natural light into the living room.
Window for kitchen ventilation and light, in line with Vastu recommendations.
Door leading to the rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and family gatherings.

additional_features.description: Expansive terrace area on the roof providing space for relaxation and joint family activities. Equipped with seating arrangements, a small garden or water feature, and safety railings in compliance with local building norms.
